meanings.definition: The quality or state of being invidious.
meanings.sent1: Her invidiousnesses towards her classmates made them feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The invidiousnesses of his actions were evident to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The invidiousnesses of the situation caused a lot of tension among the group.
meanings.sent4: The invidiousnesses of the rivalry between the two teams was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The invidiousnesses of her remarks lingered in the air long after she had left.

meanings.definition: The feeling or expression of envy or resentment.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't hide her invidiousnesses towards her friend's success.
meanings.sent2: His invidiousnesses towards his coworker were clear from his tone.
meanings.sent3: Despite her invidiousnesses, she tried to congratulate her colleague sincerely.
meanings.sent4: The invidiousnesses in her eyes betrayed her true feelings.
meanings.sent5: His invidiousnesses towards others only brought him loneliness in the end.

meanings.definition: The tendency to provoke resentment or ill will.
meanings.sent1: The invidiousnesses of his behavior caused a rift in the team.
meanings.sent2: She tried to avoid any invidiousnesses that could harm her relationships.
meanings.sent3: His invidiousnesses unintentionally created a sense of competition among his peers.
meanings.sent4: The invidiousnesses of the situation led to a breakdown in communication.
meanings.sent5: The invidiousnesses of his remarks left a sour taste in everyone's mouth.
